name: headwaters
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
streams that flow into a larger river close to where it starts: In 1866, Livingstone began his search for the headwaters of the Nile River. The Pecos River stretches hundreds of miles south from its headwaters in the mountains of New Mexico.
More examplesFewer examplesThe waterway runs from the Missouri River headwaters to the Pacific Ocean.Apache trout thrive in cooler, smaller headwaters of streams.The Green Swamp is the headwaters for five major river systems.
